main.name: Shubham Singh
main.description: Currently employed by Infosys as an Application Developer where I analyze requirements, develop new systems for a major helthcare company and slap my keyboard until everything works
main.bio: 23 year CS graduate, self-taught full stack developer who has primarily worked on the MERN stack. Moved to Pune where I work as an application developer for Infosys [ Currently working remotely from Varanasi due to the pandemic ], alongside my many ongoing personal projects. Outside of work I follow Football and am a FC Barcelona fan, love to travel and always chasing new adventures.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science Engineering

work.title: System Engineer
work.description: Developed new systems for clients, analyzed requirements, produced mapping documents & tested systems.Currently serving the role of Kanban Master in my team.

work.title: Internship Trainee
work.description: Learnt Python Programming including OOP concepts and basic data structures.Learnt C# and the MVC architecture. Created multiple C# applications following the principle of MVC architecture.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have mostly used Git for version control in small teams.

skills.name: React JS
skills.description: Started to develop webpages using React since the beginning of last year and haven't looked back due to its simplicity and flexibility. This site is built using React JS.

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice. The bulk of my experience with it has been in conjunction with ReactJS-based projects

skills.name: Javascript
skills.description: I started using JavaScript for server side while developing websites using NodeJS and Express, after I started developing webpages via ReactJS I started using it for front-end development as well.

skills.name: Mongo DB
skills.description: I have worked with both relational databases like SQL and noSQL databases like MongoDB and Firebase. MongoDB is my choice of database, even though it's easy to use it still provides all the capabilities needed to meet the complex requirements of modern applications.

skills.name: Heroku
skills.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

skills.name: Material UI
skills.description: Material-UI is a simple and customizable component library to build faster, beautiful, and more accessible React applications. It has helped me to design my websites faster while keeping the UI consistent throughout the application

projects.title: Cwn Clothing
projects.category: An e-commerce site built using ReactJS, Firebase , Redux , Hooks & GraphQL

projects.title: Tibsy News Application
projects.category: A conversational news web application built using ReactJS and Alan AI.

projects.title: Video Chat Application
projects.category: A Video Chat Application built using ReactJS and webRTC [Offline Currently]
